bioAsHtml: Xavier Mary has extensive experience in IT Services and Consulting. Working on large scale projects since 20+ years, Xavier has proven successful experiences in the full lifecycle of end-to-end architectures. Considering to be at the crossroads between Business and IT, Xavier has a wide range of experiences among various industries (Life Science, Healthcare, Retail, Banking / Insurance, ...). Always curious about business issues, he likes to explore innovative solutions and see how they can improve business outcome. Applied leadership, technical leader on many projects, facilitator between customer/local teams and development/labs teams, and professional mentor. Specialties: Analytics, Watson, Bluemix

acceptedTalks.track: Big Data, Machine Learning, IA & Analytics

bio:
Xavier Mary has extensive experience in IT Services and Consulting. Working on large scale projects since 20+ years, Xavier has proven successful experiences in the full lifecycle of end-to-end architectures.
Considering to be at the crossroads between Business and IT, Xavier has a wide range of experiences among various industries (Life Science, Healthcare, Retail, Banking / Insurance, ...). Always curious about business issues, he likes to explore innovative solutions and see how they can improve business outcome.
Applied leadership, technical leader on many projects, facilitator between customer/local teams and development/labs teams, and professional mentor.
Specialties: Analytics, Watson, Bluemix
